descripcion: Acerca del empleoDescripción del puesto: ¿Qué estamos buscando? Buscamos Big Data Engineers que quieran desarrollar su carrera profesional en el sector TI. ¿Quieres unirte a nuestro equipo de GFT? Tus principales responsabilidades serán: Aunque dependerán de tu perfil y experiencia aportada, en general las principales funciones que llevarás a cabo con nosotros serán:  Diseñar, desarrollar y testear soluciones data alineadas con las necesidades de negocio.Investigar nuevas tecnologías y algoritmos de los que desarrollarás prototipos y PoC (Proof of Concept).Trabajar en un equipo multidisciplinar, junto a Data Scientists, Software Architects y Developers.Desarrollar herramientas analíticas y programas.Desarrollar y procesar sistemas de datos.Desarrollar algoritmos y prototipos.  Requisitos deseados:  Licenciatura o Grado en Ingeniería de Software o similares.Certificaciones técnicas (Databricks, Cloudera, Confluent, GCP, Azure) es un plus.Experiencia previa de 2/3 años de experiencia en proyectos Big Data con Scala, Spark, principalmente. Flink (Java) para proceso en real time de operaciones es un plus.Conocimiento del ciclo de vida del desarrollo de software (ingeniería data, desarrollo, testeo y despliegue de soluciones data).Experiencia en desarrollo de software, analisis y diseño de arquitecturas.Experiencia en modelado y manipulación de datos.Requisito valorable: Conocimientos de soluciones data basadas en cloud (GCP, AWS, IBM Watson, Azure...)Conocimiento en transformación de datos o ETL.Inglés B2. Competencias personales:   Iniciativa, flexibilidad, proactividad y responsabilidad Habilidades de comunicación y negociación Capacidad de organización Liderazgo y gestión de equiposOfrecemos:Qué ofrecemos:  Conciliación y Flexibilidad: Posibilidad de trabajar desde casa híbrido/remoto, jornadas flexibles y viernes intensivos.Formación y Desarrollo: Plan personalizado, programas formativos.Beneficios Sociales: Cheques comida, seguro vida, apoyo teletrabajo.Retribución Flexible: Ajustada a tus necesidades (seguro médico, guardería, formación, otros).Paquete de Reubicación (si aplica): Apoyo económico, asesoramiento, patrocinio visas.Programa de Recomendaciones.Programa de Bienestar: Nutrición, Física, Mental. Descuentos con Gympass.Vida en GFT: Oficinas inteligentes, eventos, permios de valores, charlas inspiradoras.Cultura corporativa internacional En GFT consideramos que la diversidad es uno de nuestros pilares fundamentales y promovemos un entorno de trabajo inclusivo basado en la cooperación y el respeto mutuo. Ofrecemos igualdad de oportunidades a todas las personas sin tener en cuenta su raza, origen cultural, sexo, edad, orientación sexual, identidad de género, discapacidad o creencias religiosas. GFT dispone y ha registrado un Plan de Igualdad que recoge las medidas a adoptar con el objetivo de alcanzar en la empresa la igualdad de trato y de oportunidades entre mujeres y hombres y a eliminar, si es que la hay, la discriminación por razón de sexo. ¡Únete a nuestro equipo global!

herramientas: ['Google Tag Manager', 'HTML5', 'Hojas de estilos en cascada (CSS)', 'JavaScript', 'MySQL', 'PHP', 'Sistemas de gestión de contenidos (CMS)', 'Web Services API']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoVIKO es una Digital-Business Factory especializada en conectar oportunidades digitales desde 1999. ¿Cómo lo hacemos? Uniendo ideas, personas y recursos para lograr una única misión: crear valor con valores.Este holding, actualmente, está formado por:⚡Elogia (agencia de marketing digital), ⚡Marketing4eCommerce (medio de comunicación online especializado en el ecosistema digital), ⚡M4C Academy (formación online), ⚡Tandem Up (consultoría especializada en Marketplaces), ⚡Kraz (consultoría de analítica avanzada), ⚡Kaibos (Amazon brand builder),⚡Candee (consultora de talento Candidate First especializada en talento digital) y ⚡Optopus (agencia especializada en soluciones avanzadas para optimizar el punto de venta digital).Contaba Oriol Chías, nuestro CTO, y nuestro Digital Warrior número 0, que VIKO nació porque un grupo de personas que se entendían y que se lo pasaban bien querían trabajar juntas. Ahí se sembró una cultura Employee First que nos ha acompañado hasta hoy.Ahora en VIKO contamos con más de 20 años de trayectoria, oficinas en España y México, y un equipo de más de 200 talentos que hacen posible todo esto, de los cuales 23 llevan más de 10 años trabajando juntxs, y 25 se fueron un día para volver a casa un tiempo después.Si quieres ayudarnos a seguir escribiendo nuestra historia y quieres formar parte de ella… Esta puede ser tu oportunidad, y ¡estás a un click de hacerlo posible! 😎📌 Actualmente estamos buscando una persona para realizar una beca como Technical Web/ Digital Analyst para unirse a nuestro Hub de DataTech en Elogia.¿Cuál será tu misión? 🚀En Elogia nuestras apuestas fundamentales son los resultados y la innovación. Como Technical Digital Analyst, te unirás a un equipo experto en servicios y tecnologías de marketing digital, y participarás en proyectos relacionados con tecnologías web, trabajando proyectos enfocados en comercio digital. Tu principal misión será la de asegurar la consistencia y la fiabilidad de la medición web y de los resultados de las campañas, y ayudar así a la toma de decisiones basadas en data. La tipología de tareas puede variar día a día puesto que podrás participar en diferentes proyectos transversales o dar apoyo a diferentes equipos dentro de la organización.¿Cómo es el equipo con el que trabajarás? 🐙Formarás parte de una Dirección de Servicios a Cliente, donde te rodearás de profesionales que llevan la innovación en su ADN y que se vuelcan en enamorar a su cliente. Estas personas tienen conocimiento especializado en distintas áreas especializadas del marketing digital: Market Intelligence, SEO, UX, Analítica, Marketing Automation, Social & Content MK y Paid Media. Además, tendrás siempre el acompañamiento de tu Hub Leader, que será responsable de la gestión del conocimiento dentro del Hub de DataTech, del que formarás parte.¿Y cómo lo harás? 📅Colaborarás en el mantenimiento y el desarrollo de herramientas internas (10% de tu día a día) y webs (especialmente ecommerce).Implementarás scripts para la medición de datos, especialmente a través de tag containers (sobre todo Google Tag Manager).Colaborarás en la implementación técnica y en la configuración de cualquier herramienta de medición (especialmente Google Analytics).Gestionarás datos de campañas, colaborando en la extracción, transformación e integración de datos de campañas y de las diferentes fuentes de datos (Funnel, Metricool, etc), encargándote de tratarlos, limpiarlos y cargarlos en las diferentes herramientas de informes (Looker Studio).Colaborarás en la carga y consulta de datos en data warehouses, especialmente BigQuery.Participarás en proyectos de automatización de procesos.Solucionarás incidencias técnicas que reporten los clientes u otros departamentos.Pero, antes de seguir, ¡queremos que conozcas nuestro secreto! ¿Por qué nuestrxs Digital Warriors se sienten como en casa? 🏠 Mejor no te lo contamos nosotrxs, ¡esto es todo lo que dicen ellxs!💗 Por las personas y por el buen ambiente que se respira. Nos gusta lo que hacemos, nos ayudamos los unxs a los otrxs, nos divertimos, y hacemos de cada día una aventura.⏰ Por la flexibilidad y la conciliación para que haya un equilibrio trabajo-vida personal.🪁 Por la confianza que se tiene en cada persona, dando la libertad, el empoderamiento y la responsabilidad de liderar proyectos y llevarlos al éxito, siempre bajo la filosofía “Learning by doing”.📈 Por los proyectos retadores y el aprendizaje continuo de la mano de clientes top (Nestlé, Reckitt, Beam Suntory, Taurus...), y de las personas expertas de la casa.🎯 Por el crecimiento profesional y el acompañamiento gracias a las sesiones de Mentoring, que nos ayudan a lograr nuestras metas y a hacer brillar nuestras habilidades. Evitamos las “típicas” evaluaciones de desempeño.¿Qué te ofrecemos? 🎉Horario flexible de entrada y de salida.Jornada intensiva todos los viernes, y los meses de julio y agosto.23 días de vacaciones + 3 (el 24 y el 31 de diciembre y el día de tu cumpleaños, ¡te los regalamos!)Formato de asistencia híbrido: Pedimos una asistencia mínima a la oficina de dos días por semana (entre martes y jueves). No obstante, las oficinas están abiertas de lunes a viernes para que puedan ser utilizadas. La asistencia será opcional durante los períodos de Semana Santa, mes de Agosto, semana del 6-8 de diciembre (en ciertos casos) y semanas de Navidad y Reyes.Oficinas en Barcelona, Madrid, Vigo, A Coruña y CDMX.Descuentos exclusivos en marcas como PlatanoMelon, Hero, Surippa, entre otras.Beca completa para formación en Marketing4eCommerce Academy: tendrás acceso gratuito a nuestro campus.Recursos relacionados con el desarrollo personal y apoyo psicológico 24/7 a través de Mindgram.Actividades de equipo organizadas por la Comisión de Fiestas #WeAreFun.¿Qué necesitamos de ti? 😎Haber finalizado o estar finalizando un CFGS/Grado/Máster y poder realizar convenio de prácticas o beca SALCINES a tiempo completo, durante un mínimo de 6 meses, y un máximo de 12 meses.Conocimientos de programación (no son imprescindibles todas, pero sí deseable que manejes alguna de las siguientes): PHP, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML 5, CSS, MySQL, XML, JSON.Conocimientos de BigQuery, CMPs, Firebase, MMP.Grandes capacidades analíticas y creativas para resolver problemas.Actitud curiosa, proactiva, con gusto por los retos y los desafíos, y de espíritu inconformista.Conocimientos de los principales CMS del mercado (WordPress, PrestaShop, Magento, etc)Experiencia en el uso de APIs.Por último, pero no menos importante, que compartas nuestros valores: ¡Empower talent, Truly together, Good vibes, We love change, and Own it & Make it happen!Valoraremos muy positivamente....Conocimientos de Google Analytics (GA4), tanto en la parte de implementación como en la parte analítica.Conocimientos previos e interés por desarrollarse en el ámbito del marketing digital como Technical Digital Analyst.Tener perfil en GitHub o que nos enseñes algún proyecto del que te sientas orgullosx.¿Eres tú nuestrx próximx Digital Warrior?¡Te estamos esperando! 😉Celebramos la diversidad y queremos que nuestro equipo refleje esto de manera inclusiva. En VIKO, nos comprometemos con la igualdad de oportunidades de empleo independientemente de la etnia, religión, sexo, origen nacional, orientación sexual, edad, estado civil, discapacidad, género, identidad o expresión de género.#internship #technicaldigitalanalyst #javascript #php #html #cms #developer #data

herramientas: ['Adobe Experience Manager', 'Arquitectura', 'Arquitectura de datos', 'Arquitectura de empresa', 'Arquitectura de soluciones', 'Ciencias de la computación', 'Computación en la nube', 'Frameworks de arquitectura', 'TOGAF', 'Zachman']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoJob DescriptionThe Enterprise/ Solution Architect will play an pivotal role in driving the Ford Credit Europe (FCE) strategic transformation efforts. You will work with multiple teams to help them in their migration from existing legacy systems to modern cloud-based platforms. Your expertise in financial organisations, cloud technology and enterprise architecture will be instrumental in guiding our modernisation efforts and ensuring a seamless transition for both our business partners and our banking customers. As part of this role you will work with both engineering product teams and senior business managers to help define both the technical and business strategy at an enterprise level.Responsibilities Help develop future strategic solutions, collaborating with business stakeholders, IT product teams and external partners  Develop and maintain architecture artefacts including roadmaps and current / future state designs following industry standard architecture models such as TOGAF  Design transitional architectures to help product teams on their modernisation journeys and guide teams through required enterprise architecture processes ensuring alignment with banking standards.  Provide technical leadership and guidance to product teams, overseeing implementation of architecture designs and sharing your experience QualificationsKnowledge, Skills & Abilities Experience of leading cross functional teams through large scale technology transformation initiatives within the financial industry  Proven track record as an Enterprise Architect, experience of helping to implement successful modernisation projects and migrating existing applications to the cloud  Strong knowledge of cloud computing platforms, specifically Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services and associated best practices  Excellent analytical and problem solving skills with strong emphasis on follow through, whilst managing your own workload.  Proficiency in developing Enterprise / Solution Architecture artefacts using standard architecture frameworks such as TOGAF / Zachman  Knowledge of modern application technologies and platforms such as SalesForce, AEM, MFEs, Graph, Apollo, React  Knowledge of Security and identity management architecture standards  Familiarity with modern software development methodologies, DevOps practices and agile / SAFE frameworks  Implementation knowledge of common FinTech Core Banking platforms  Understanding of legacy platforms such as Java Weblogic, AS400 and DB2 Qualifications & Background Google Professional Cloud Architect certification.  Degree in computer science/ engineering, Data science or related field  5+ years experience in Enterprise / Solution / Cloud Architecture  Strong understanding of Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Additional Information Due to the nature of the work, which may be driven by strict deadlines, there will be an occasional requirement to work flexible hours, which may include evenings and/or weekends.  Our products are used worldwide, therefore occasional trips abroad may also be required. The role is based in Madrid (Spain) with allowance of partial teleworking.Ford is committed to diversity and equality of opportunity for all and is opposed to any form of less favourable treatment or harassment on the grounds of gender, marital status, civil partnership status, parental status, race, ethnic origin, colour, nationality, national origin, disability, sexual orientation, religion/belief, gender reassignment and gender identity, age and those with caring responsibilities.

herramientas: ['Documentación', 'Elaboración de documentos', 'Gestión de vulnerabilidades', 'Inglés', 'Lenguajes de programación', 'Liderazgo de equipos', 'Negociación', 'Project Plus', 'Pruebas de seguridad', 'Technical Papers']
descripcion: Acerca del empleo¿QUÉ ES TELEFÓNICA CYBERSECURITY & CLOUD TECH? Somos la compañía líder en transformación digital y la cuna del talento en materia de ciberseguridad y de la nube.Trabajamos para que saques todo el partido a tu vida digital sin tener que preocuparte por nada. Nos encargamos de hacer la seguridad más humana y generar en las personas la confianza y tranquilidad que necesitan.Buscamos nuevas formas de hacer las cosas, ideas frescas e innovadoras, experimentar, divertirnos y ser entusiastas en lo que hacemos. Somos techies y queremos mejorar el mundo haciéndolo más diverso, sostenible y ciberseguro.Si tuviéramos que resumir como nos gustaría que nos definieran, no hay duda que nos gusta trabajar en equipo, remando en la misma dirección y con metas comunes, con actitud valiente y sin miedo al cambio, contando con los mejores y buscando la excelencia en lo que hacemos, abiertos y transparentes en nuestros procesos. www.telefonicatech.com ¿QUÉ HACEMOS EN EL EQUIPO?  La unidad de Seguridad Ofensiva de Telefónica Cybersecurity & Cloud Tech tiene por objeto proporcionar a las organizaciones una postura de seguridad precisa y real con gracias a una serie de pruebas de seguridad entre las que se incluyen pruebas de intrusión y evaluaciones de seguridad, que nos permiten ofrecer a nuestros clientes descubrir vulnerabilidades críticas en su entorno y ayudar a priorizar y abordar los riesgos en función de su explotabilidad e impacto. ¿CÓMO SERÁ TU DÍA A DÍA?  En tu día a día será habitual enfrentarte a tareas de la siguiente tipología:Gestión de vulnerabilidades (comprobación de falsos positivos o casos reales)Revisión detallada de activos.Tratamiento de alertas generadas por los serviciosRevisión y ponderación de las alertas en función de la criticidadConsultoría de entornos de IT y OT.Elaboración de documentos técnicos para los clientes. Y PARA ELLO, CREEMOS QUE SERÍA IDEAL QUE CONTARAS CON…  Experiencia Al menos 2 o 3 años de experiencia en trabajos de consultoría. Formación  Necesario:Titulación Media o Superior en Informática, Telecomunicaciones o disciplinas técnicas afines. CertificacionesDeberá poseer al menos una de las siguientes certificaciones:CEHOSCPeWPTeCPPTv2 Conocimientos técnicos Tecnologías/Herramientas:NessusMetasploitAcunetixDeseable, lenguajes de programación:PythonBashConocimientos de sistemas operativos Windows y Linux.Conocimientos en tecnologías AWS, Azure y/o Digital Ocean. Para desempeñar el rol, las skills que encajarían con el equipo y el proyecto serían: Pasión por la tecnología y la seguridad ofensiva.Proactividad, capacidad para asumir retos.Capacidad de transmitir ideas técnicamente complejas a audiencia no técnica.Capacidad de trabajo en equipo. IDIOMASEspañol: avanzado o nativo.Inglés: Deberá contar con un nivel B1 o superior. #SomosDiversos #FomentamosigualdadEstamos convencidos/as de que los equipos diversos e inclusivos son más innovadores, transformadores y consiguen mejores resultados. Por ello promovemos y garantizamos la inclusión de todas las personas sin importar género, edad, orientación e identidad sexual, cultura, discapacidad o cualquier otra condición ¡Queremos conocerte! 😊Enviar candidatura ahora »

herramientas: ['Oracle SQL Developer', 'Tableau']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoEn HAYS estamos colaborando con una empresa con 100 años de antigüedad, cuyo producto es la tinta de seguridad: billetes, pasaportes, DNI era su modelo de negocio inicial pero hace 15 años han evolucionado su modelo de negocio hacia las soluciones digitales de trazabilidad, monitorización y autenticación.Actualmente buscamos un perfil de BI Software Engineer para incorporarse a su equipo.¿Cuáles serán tus funciones?  Desarrollar y mantener un almacén de datos en columnas y un sistema de informes.Crear soluciones de inteligencia y monitoreo para la elaboración de perfiles de riesgo y estrategias de aplicación de la ley.Integre y analice datos de múltiples fuentes, asegurando el cumplimiento de los requisitos del cliente y la alineación de la estrategia comercial.Liderar el diseño y mantenimiento de aplicaciones de BI, personalizarlas a niveles regionales, implementarlas en entornos de clientes y brindar soporte de segundo nivel.Gestionar las actividades de desarrollo, incluido el análisis técnico, las estimaciones de esfuerzo y la coordinación con otros equipos.Instalar, configurar, optimizar, soportar y mantener aplicaciones de inteligencia.Preparar informes de actividad periódicos y asesorar/capacitar a otro personal técnico.¿Cuáles son los requisitos?Licenciatura en un campo relevanteExperiencia en desarrollo e implementación de Sistemas de Información.Historial comprobado endesarrollo de BI y soluciones de generación de informes.Conocimiento técnico en bases de datos con fuertes habilidadesSQL (Oracle) y visualización de datos utilizando Tableau como herramienta de generación de informes.Conocimiento y experiencia en ingeniería de datos,procesos ETL y ELT, desarrollo de pipelines de datos y almacenamiento de datos (base de datos en columnas)Experiencia en las siguientes tecnologías/áreas, un plus:Spark, Apache Kafka, Apache Parquet, HadoopOrientado a resultados, impulsado por objetivos y capacidad para priorizar el trabajo de forma independienteExcelentes habilidades de comunicación y del idioma inglés.¿Qué ofrecemos?Salario competitivo.Modalidad: HibridaUbicación: Madrid.Estamos esperando perfiles como el tuyo, apasionados con la tecnología y que quiera enfrentarse a un nuevo reto. Si es tu caso, inscríbete en la oferta para que podamos contarte más!

herramientas: ['Altair', 'Calibradores', 'Capacidad de análisis', 'Comunicación', 'Documentación', 'Hypermesh', 'Hyperworks', 'Método de los elementos finitos (MEF)', 'Optistruct', 'Revisión de diseños']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoReq ID: 427935At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, 80,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars.Could you be the full-time Calculation Engineer in Barcelona we’re looking for?Your future roleTake on a new challenge and apply your calculation expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll work alongside young and proactive teammates.You'll perform discipline activities and deliverables on project taking into account applicable instructions/processes and other specific Customer (internal or external) requirements. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business (project management, engineering), define load cases according to applicable standards, either static and cycle loads; as well as boundary conditions and much more.You’ll specifically take care of performing the calculation discipline activities and producing associated deliverables in compliance with QCD commitments, but also creating meshed models from CATIA 3D models, with either 1D, 2D or 3D finite elements, with Hypermesh software.We’ll look to you for: Performing the Finite Element Analysis in Hyperworks software.  Analysing calculated deformations,stresses and vibration modes obtained.  Suggesting design improvements of calculated parts  Defining gauges position for strain gauge test with full scale parts  Preparing and documenting calculation discipline reports, calculation notes showing FEA conclusions, according to project schedule and following-up the main open actions.  Performing correlation analysis with test results.  Preparing and documenting Mechanical Domain Design Reviews  Updating Calculation Notes taking into account Change Requests.  Complying with QCD commitments and reporting on calculation discipline activities progress and alerting relevant N+1 in case of issue potentially impacting achievement of QCD commitments  Applying discipline rules, processes and tools and ensuring discipline calculation deliverables quality and their acceptance by the Customer (internal) within committed limits  Suggesting design improvements of calculated parts  QCD commitments.  Managing calculation discipline FEA engineers on Project (external).  Perform quotation of engineering workpackage , upon request  Defining Project Mechanical Decomposition (PBS)  Supporting Sourcing, Industrialization and Manufacturing teams during Production ramp-up.  Collaborating with MDL for continuous improvement of the Domain (including RoE) All About YouWe value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Mechanical Engineering.  Mechanical Engineering preferably applied to Railway products with more than 2 years of experience.  Good Communications and interpersonal skills including with third parties (customer).  Time management and reporting skill.  Sense of urgency / priority.  Structured and organised with Hands-on approach.  English operational in read/writing and technical meeting.  Finite Elements Analysis proved experience for more than 2 years  Knowledge and experience with Altair Hyperworks softwares (Hypermesh, Hyperview, Hypergraph…) for more than one year.  Knowledge and experience with solver OptiStruct for more than one year. Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines  Work with rolling stock cutting-edge projects  Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues  Contribute to innovative projects  Utilise our cooperative working environment  Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries  Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning  Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you!An agile, inclusive and responsible culture is the foundation of our company where diverse people are offered excellent opportunities to grow, learn and advance in their careers. We are committed to encouraging our employees to reach their full potential, while valuing and respecting them as individuals.

descripcion: Acerca del empleoDesde HAYS estamos en búsqueda de un Senior Data Architect para una compañia internacional, que tiene un gran proyecto de transformación digital, en el que Barcelona será unos de los hubs más importantes del proceso.Buscamos un Arquitecto de Datos senior que pueda desarrollar la arquitectura, mejorarla y optimizarla de manera conjunta con el resto de equipos internacionales, y que se encargue técnicamente de todo lo relativo a la arquitectura en la oficina de Barcelona, siendo total responsable técnico en el diseño y propuesta de soluciones, incluyendo gobernanza, toma de decisión...¿Qué buscamos?Experiencia en arquitectura de AWS en la parte de Data, en la integración de soluciones a la aqruitectura de IA, MLOps.Creación en arquitectura de Gobernanza de datos, gestión de la misma con diferentes stakeholders de negocio, adecuar requerimientos...Conocimiento en multitud de Productos Data, para integración, decisión y optimización...Experiencia demostrable en proyectos relacionados¿Qué ofrecemos?Salario competitivo en el sector (70-90k)Modelo híbrido de teletrabajo en Barcelona (3 dias oficina - 2 homeworking)Gran cantidad de beneficios sociales como paquete retributivoPlan de carrera importante, con mucha proyección, y un proyecto innovador en una de las compañías con más prestigio en su sector.Si crees que tu perfil puede encajar, y te suena interesante el proyecto y quieres saber más, no dudes en aplicar y/o preguntarme para conocer más acerca de la posición.

descripcion: Acerca del empleoSobre Nosotros 🌍 Fundada en 2004 como Techedge, acumulamos casi 20 años de experiencia para convertirnos en lo que somos hoy: ¡Avvale!Este recorrido nos ha llevado a contar con más de 3.000 profesionales, presentes en 11 países de todo el mundo.Qué hacemos🌱Ayudamos a empresas públicas y privadas a repensar sus modelos de negocio a través del desarrollo de soluciones innovadoras y sostenibles que tienen un impacto positivo no sólo en nuestros clientes, ¡sino también en el mundo en el que vivimos!Qué buscamos 🎯¡Continuamos creciendo! Buscamos una persona especializada en programación ABAP con experiencia en SAP NetWeaver; resolutiva, con iniciativa y orientada al trabajo en equipo, con ganas de enfrentarse a retos y apostar por la sostenibilidad y la innovación. Formarás parte del equipo de AMS de Avvale, donde podrás aportar tu experiencia y crecer participando en proyectos de mantenimiento correctivo y evolutivo, así como reingeniería de procesos.Requisitos imprescindibles 💻Experiencia de entre 3-5 años como programador ABAPProgramación ABAP con o sin orientación a objetosWorkflows tanto con objetos BOR como con clasesWeb Dynpros ABAPTratamiento de XMLs mediante transformaciones XSLTServicios Web mediante intercambio de mensajes XML (SOAP)Servicios Web mediante JSON (API Rest)SAP NetWeaver Folders Management o SAP Records ManagementResidencia en EspañaRequisitos muy valorables si cumples los imprescindibles 💪 Programación en JAVABusiness Server Page (BSP)Formularios Sapscript y SmartformsPlantillas Word mediante controles de contenido de textoArchiveLinkBusiness Document ServiceConocimientos en HTML 5, Javascript, CSS, OData, Fiori¡Te ofrecemos la oportunidad de trabajar con un equipo apasionado por la tecnología y en un entorno colaborativo!¿Qué ofrecemos? 📢 Contrato indefinidoSalario fijo + Salario variable + Beneficios de compañía y acceso a descuentos con empresas privadas a través de nuestra Avvale ClubAcceso a un plan de retribución flexibleRemuneración competitiva acorde a la experiencia y adecuación al puestoAcceso a formación técnica y certificacionesSi crees que te puede interesar, no lo dudes, ¡aplica a nuestra oferta!📩Y recuerda - "There is no growth without the ability to change" 🚀

descripcion: Acerca del empleoIniciamos nuevo proceso de selección para acceder a un curso de formación en Líquidos Penetrantes con el fin de ser incorporados/as a nuestras áreas de fabricación de Ensayos No Destructivos.¿Qué perfil estamos buscando?• Formación: Grado Superior en Fabricación Mecánica ó similar.• Experiencia: Se valorará experiencia en Líquidos penetrantes u otro END así como experiencia en documentación relacionada con END.• Idiomas: inglés: Básico.• Soft Skills: - Capacidad de trabajo en entornos multidisciplinares.- Capacidad para optimizar procesos en entornos productivos.- Orientación al cliente.Serás formado en:Ensayos de Líquidos Penetrantes y END.Llevar a cabo operaciones manuales, tales como chorreado, limpiezas, montajes y desmontajes de piezas.Manejo de productos relacionados con el proceso (productos químicos).Desarrollar operaciones de limpiezas y polivalencias a otras áreas (chorreado).Todos estos trabajos en calidad y coste establecido.Darás servicio a ITP Aero desde su sede de Zamudio, Barakaldo ó Sestao de la mano de profesionales con dilatada experiencia en el sector en una empresa líder en motores y componentes aeronáuticos que se sitúa entre las primeras compañías de la industria aeronáutica global.Trabajarás estrechamente en un entorno productivo con interlocución fluida con tecnólogos certificados internacionalmente.Esta formación te interesa si… Si deseas especializarte en el área de los Ensayos No Destructivos de aleaciones aeronáuticas y tener la oportunidad de trabajar en una empresa líder en el sector aeronáutico en continuo crecimiento.

descripcion: Acerca del empleoAbout Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (RELOCATION PROVIDED)Location of this job: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote working.)About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The role sits within the Analytics team under Supply department, where new business ideas, and partnership types are incubated and scaled. This is a broad scoped role, suited to those with a track record of leading small analytics function and/or creating new and high impact business verticals from scratch, from a consulting, sales or business development background with a strong entrepreneurial mindset. You will be expected to perform opportunity sizing on new business opportunities, build high level business cases to justify your proposals and work closely with Product teams to build out new features and functionalities prior to dealing directly with external partners to negotiate and close deals.We are seeking a Manager/Senior Manager, Analytics & Insights, to lead strategic and operational initiatives that create both growth and efficiency for the Supply department. In this role, you will work directly with multiple stakeholders, including executive leadership and various cross-functional departments to successfully implement key initiatives. You will impact Agoda’s business through exploring new business opportunities, analyzing complex scaling challenges, and improve existing operations.The Opportunity:In this Role, you’ll get to: General: This role is a blend of hands on ‘in the business’ and executive level ‘on the business’ work. To succeed you will enjoy rolling up your sleeves, leading a team and contributing to strategyProject Delivery: Manage, standardize & validate the structure of business cases for product development, headcount, engineering resources, budgets, general strategic & roadmap prioritizationExperimentation: Define success, measure / validate experiments and help ingrain an experimental mindset within the teamsForecasting and Insights: Provide a macro-led business intelligence view to the organization to prevent missed opportunities, surmount obstacles at all organizational levels and drive commercial behaviorsAnalytics & Alerts: Quantitative analysis, data mining and presentation of business metrics; identify drivers and build an end-to-end communication framework based on business value, effort and urgencyProcess Improvement: Work with all teams to drive inter- and intra- departmental efficiencies, optimize processes and prioritize system enhancementsReporting: Build dashboards, internal / external reports and present key datasets to enable all team members to efficiently and effectively monitor performance and prioritize their effortsLeadership: Lead a small team of experts to deliver the above functions and be excited by the challenge of mentoring team members across the chain and connectivity teams What you’ll Need to Succeed:6+ years of leadership experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy3+ years’ experience leading analytics, operational, product or other technical teamsExpert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, SQL, Tableau, Python, R, or similarStrong statistical modelling and machine learning knowledgeStrong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the businessExcellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skillsAbility to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resourcesStrong program/project management experienceBachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance)Experience in articulating strategic issues and negotiating with C-level executives – experience in leading strategy consulting projects a plusPeople management – track record of developing starsAbility and willingness to drive projects independently, working efficiently to deliver results rapidly and engaging the relevant stakeholders throughout the processIt’s Great if you Have:Master’s degree in statistics, economics, mathematics descripcion: Acerca del empleoSobre el áreaLa unidad de RCS Engineering es el área Global, que define el Marco de Control de Riesgos no financieros y contrasta la implantación del mismo por parte de la primera línea. puestoPrincipales Funciones del puesto RCS Engineering:Análisis de riesgos IT de las nuevas iniciativas de Áreas Holding.Revisar los marcos de control y contrastar la identificación de riesgos, mitigantes y evidencias de las iniciativas que por su perfil de riesgo se escalen a CCARO.Analizar y contrastar las valoraciones de riesgo de las iniciativas que se gestionen en los circuitos de admisión de riesgo.Participar y contribuir en la evolución de las herramientas, procedimientos y protocolos utilizados en la admisión del riesgo tecnológico de la entidad.Soporte a la comunicación y impulsando su implantación y aplicación Global tanto internamente como en las subcontrataciones a terceros.Formación: Titulación universitaria en Ingeniería Informática, Telecomunicaciones, Industriales o Licenciatura en Físicas o Matemáticas.Experiencia Profesional:Más de 3 años de experiencia profesional en Gestión de Riesgos Tecnológicos (E2E).Auditoría/Consultoría en ámbitos de Riesgo Tecnológico y Seguridad de la Información.Experiencia en proyectos de IT (Seguridad, Fraude, Infraestructura, Arquitectura, etc).Idiomas:Inglés mínimo B2, deseable nivel C1.Conocimientos valorados en el ámbito de Engineering:Certificaciones de IT / Seguridad / Riesgos.Experiencia en metodologías de análisis de riesgos tecnológicos.Conocimiento sobre las mejores prácticas y estándares (ISO 27000, CSA, NIST, ICT, etc..).Experiencia en la definición e implementación de frameworks integrales para la gestión de Riesgos ICT/ Seguridad.Conocimiento de Normativas de Control Interno.Master y/o postgrado en el ámbito tecnológico, seguridad de la información, ciberseguridad y/o financiero (MBA).Habilidades:Capacidad de comunicación efectiva.Capacidad y empatía para participar en un equipo multi geografía.Capacidad para trabajar en una organización por proyectos y enfoque colaborativo.Capacidad de integración con otros departamentos y funciones internas.Capacidad de aprendizaje continuo dentro del ámbito digital y de las nuevas tecnologías.Capacidad de rendimiento en base a objetivos/KPI's.Enfoque en los resultados, con un fuerte deseo de investigar y dominar constantemente los nuevos conceptos, tecnologías y controles relacionados con Tecnología y Seguridad de la información y aplicar a las tareas y entregables continuos.

descripcion: Acerca del empleoAbout Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (RELOCATION PROVIDED)Location of this job: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote working.)About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The role sits within the Analytics team under Supply department, where new business ideas, and partnership types are incubated and scaled. This is a broad scoped role, suited to those with a track record of leading small analytics function and/or creating new and high impact business verticals from scratch, from a consulting, sales or business development background with a strong entrepreneurial mindset. You will be expected to perform opportunity sizing on new business opportunities, build high level business cases to justify your proposals and work closely with Product teams to build out new features and functionalities prior to dealing directly with external partners to negotiate and close deals.We are seeking a Manager/Senior Manager, Analytics & Insights, to lead strategic and operational initiatives that create both growth and efficiency for the Supply department. In this role, you will work directly with multiple stakeholders, including executive leadership and various cross-functional departments to successfully implement key initiatives. You will impact Agoda’s business through exploring new business opportunities, analyzing complex scaling challenges, and improve existing operations.The Opportunity:In this Role, you’ll get to: General: This role is a blend of hands on ‘in the business’ and executive level ‘on the business’ work. To succeed you will enjoy rolling up your sleeves, leading a team and contributing to strategyProject Delivery: Manage, standardize & validate the structure of business cases for product development, headcount, engineering resources, budgets, general strategic & roadmap prioritizationExperimentation: Define success, measure / validate experiments and help ingrain an experimental mindset within the teamsForecasting and Insights: Provide a macro-led business intelligence view to the organization to prevent missed opportunities, surmount obstacles at all organizational levels and drive commercial behaviorsAnalytics & Alerts: Quantitative analysis, data mining and presentation of business metrics; identify drivers and build an end-to-end communication framework based on business value, effort and urgencyProcess Improvement: Work with all teams to drive inter- and intra- departmental efficiencies, optimize processes and prioritize system enhancementsReporting: Build dashboards, internal / external reports and present key datasets to enable all team members to efficiently and effectively monitor performance and prioritize their effortsLeadership: Lead a small team of experts to deliver the above functions and be excited by the challenge of mentoring team members across the chain and connectivity teams What you’ll Need to Succeed:6+ years of leadership experience in analytics/data science/insights/strategy3+ years’ experience leading analytics, operational, product or other technical teamsExpert domain of data analysis and data visualization tools and software such as Excel, SQL, Tableau, Python, R, or similarStrong statistical modelling and machine learning knowledgeStrong experience in finding data insights and provide business recommendation to the businessExcellent communicator with superior written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal communication skillsAbility to multi-task, prioritize and coordinate resourcesStrong program/project management experienceBachelor’s degree ideally in a business or quantitative subject (e.g. computer science, mathematics, engineering, science, economics or finance)Experience in articulating strategic issues and negotiating with C-level executives – experience in leading strategy consulting projects a plusPeople management – track record of developing starsAbility and willingness to drive projects independently, working efficiently to deliver results rapidly and engaging the relevant stakeholders throughout the processIt’s Great if you Have:Master’s degree in statistics, economics, mathematics descripcion: Acerca del empleo#Be MoreDo you aspire to a rewarding career that lets you do more and achieve more? Unleash your full potential at work with TDCX, an award-winning and fast-growing BPO company. Work with the world’s most loved brands and be with awesome, diverse people. Be home, belong, and start your journey to #BeMore!Main missionReporting to the Deal Desk Team Lead, the Deal Desk Analyst will be responsible for supporting our client´s group of sales representatives (Silicon Valley Digital Giant), by helping them to navigate the complexities of our client's sales and fulfillment processes.Being the first point of contact for the sales reps you will be answering questions, giving advice, and solving problems using your technical knowledge and expertise. As a successful Deal Desk Analyst, you will become an expert in core operations and operational chance, truly understanding the nuts and bolts of a SaaS business and sales life cycle.Responsibilities:Provide consultative support/troubleshooting to sales reps who will create cases using a CRM when (back office) support is required.To resolve the case within the agreed SLA (Service Level Agreement) which will change depending on the case type.Meet or exceed defined targets related to response & resolution times.Educate sales reps on processes, and best practices, to improve performance and release sales capacity to core sales activities.Build working relationships cross-functionally that will help resolve special requests from the sales team.Be an expert in our client's CRM and ERP Systems.Follow up with Sales Reps & cross-functional teams to retrieve the required information in order to solve cases quickly and in accordance with our client's sales policies.Ensure Sales Reps follow our client's guidelines and sales policies while moving opportunities through the sales life cycle.RequirementsAbility to communicate confidently with tech-savvy customers using perfect written and spoken English.Understanding of Sales Order processing & Customer Support Operations.The ability to navigate and progress the sales process through long, complex sales cycles.Excellent communication, organizational, detailed oriented, and client-service skills.To read the case notes and be able to fully understand & identify the request received.Experience in Back Office, Customer Service, and/or office call center environment is a plus.Ability to work independently and to multi-task, set priorities, and manage time effectively.Ability to work effectively with clients and cross-functional teams.Ability to provide meaningful insights from data.Strong time management skills and motivation to exceed expectations. But nothing beats the commitment to yourself to be as good as you possibly can. We will help you to achieve this goal.Problem-solving skills and the ability to “Think outside of the box” to offer creative solutions.To take full ownership and responsibility for the cases you are working on during their “Life cycle”.Good command of Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook & Teams) & CRMs.Punctuality. Your clients and teammates are counting on you to be here, every day.Top reasons to work here:Attractive remuneration, great perks, and performance incentivesComprehensive medical, insurance, or social security coverageWorld-class workspacesEngaging activities and recognition programsStrong learning and development plans for your career growthA positive culture for you to #BeMore at workEasy-to-locate area with direct access to public transportFlexible working arrangementsBe coached and mentored by experts in your fieldJoin a global company, winner of hundreds of industry awards

herramientas: ['Aprendizaje profundo', 'Ciencia de datos', 'Ciencias de la computación', 'Comunicación', 'Ingeniería de datos', 'Keras', 'MLOps', 'Procesamiento de lenguaje natural', 'Reconocimiento de patrones', 'Visión por computador']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoTUI Group is the world’s number one integrated tourism business. Customer Hub & Common Analytics Domain is a global team within TUI technology responsible for Marketing & Technology Analytics. We are a multi-disciplinary team of experts across Architecture, Engineering, DevOps and Agile Delivery providing services across the UK, Ireland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Belgium and The Netherlands.At TUI we are ambitious to become the leader in technology within the travel industry and to achieve this we are looking to build a capable, creative team who want to be a part of accomplishing that goal.We never stop looking ahead, seeking new ways to delight our customers and grow our business. We recognise the power of digital and the massive contribution this brings to creating a truly unique and differentiated customer experience.The Machine Learn Engineer is responsible to Develop, implement, and maintain machine learning models and algorithm working closely with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into production systems.About The JobAs a Machine Learning Operations Engineer your expertise will be pivotal in designing and implementing scalable infrastructure for deploying, monitoring, and managing machine learning models in production. Collaborate closely with data engineers and data scientists, contributing to the seamless streamlining of the deployment process. Your role extends to implementing automated testing and continuous integration/delivery pipelines, ensuring the efficiency and reliability of machine learning models throughout their lifecycle. Uphold the highest standards of security and compliance in all aspects of machine learning systems. As a trouble shooter extraordinaire, you will identify and resolve issues related to model deployment and performance, ensuring a robust and stable production environment. Collaboration with cross-functional teams is inherent in your role, aligning ML Ops processes with overall business goals for maximum impact. About YouProficiency in scripting languages like Python or Bash. Experience with containerization tools such as Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes. Knowledge of DevOps practices and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their machine learning services. Strong understanding of model monitoring, logging, and troubleshooting in a production environment. Collaboration skills to work with data scientists, engineers, and other stakeholders. Excellent communication skills and the ability to document processes. Experience with model versioning and model registry tools. Knowledge of MLOps tools such as MLflow or Kubeflow. Understanding of security practices in machine learning deployment. Previous experience with managing and deploying models in edge computing environments. Certifications in cloud platforms and/or DevOps practices. About Our OfferWorking in the leading global tourism group: We stand for intercultural cooperation and offer the opportunity to work in international projects and teams.Fantastic holiday benefits including discounts, special offersMobile working, flexible working hours, and working from abroad: We believe that work is something you do, not where you go. Our offer: TUI Way of Working Health and Wellbeing support in five key areas – Health, Social, Community, Career and FinancialDevelopment and career opportunities: We offer a wide range of digital training and international career opportunities.Additional benefits relevant to the local market that you'll be based inAt TUI, we know people are as diverse as the destinations we send our customers to. We love to see your uniqueness shine through and inspire the future of travel. If you would like to read more about what Diversity & Inclusion means to us simply visit our Smile page Click hereIf you have any questions, please contact the Recruiter for this role via the contact information included in the advert.Please Note: These vacancies will be managed by an International Recruitment Team and therefore your application may be viewed by TUI colleagues outside your home country.

herramientas: ['Desarrollo de software', 'Desarrollo front end', 'GitLab', 'JavaScript', 'Oracle Database', 'Project Plus', 'Python', 'SQL', 'Servicios web', 'Terraform', 'Web Service Development']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoTelespazio Ibérica forma parte del Grupo Telespazio, uno de los principales actores mundiales en soluciones y servicios satelitales. Con raíces cartográficas y más de 20 años de experiencia en soluciones territoriales para grandes corporaciones e instituciones, Telespazio Ibérica es una empresa de referencia a nivel europeo en el sector de Nuevas Tecnologías aplicadas al Territorio. Telespazio Ibérica ofrece servicios que cubren el ciclo completo desde la generación del dato cartográfico con las últimas tecnologías, hasta el desarrollo de soluciones informáticas combinando Sistemas de Información Geográficos (SIG), telecomunicaciones y dispositivos móviles.El ámbito de la gestión y observación de la Biodiversidad, donde Telespazio es ya un actor clave en mercado Europeo (programa Copernicus de la Unión Europea), un nuevo programa de I+D+i permitirá desarrollar nuevos Servicios Geoespaciales basados en la combinación de UAS (vehículos no tripulados) y satélites, así como la evolución en las tecnologías de navegación avanzadas para UTM y U-Space.En este contexto y a fin de cubrir las necesidades de este nuevo programa, Telespazio Ibérica selecciona para su departamento de TI a Ingenieros Informáticos de Software con experiencia como Analista (Técnico y Funcional) para colaborar en nuestras oficinas de Barcelona, Vigo o Madrid o en la oficina del proyecto en Fuerteventura.El candidato contribuirá, en coordinación directa con el Jefe del Proyecto de Desarrollo, mediante la realización de las distintas funciones:- Soporte en la Recogida de requisitos, análisis funcional, planificación y gestión.- Diseño funcional y técnico de los desarrollos a implementar, diseño de la arquitectura de sistemas y base de datos, elaboración de documentación técnica (arquitectura, base de datos, procesos, informes, manuales de operación, gestión y usuario)- Interrelación con las áreas usuarias en lo referente a sus proyectos asignados- Dirección de los programadores asignados (supervisión de los desarrollos y pruebas realizadas)Se ofrece: · Estabilidad y crecimiento profesional· Buen ambiente de trabajo· Formación en horario y centro de trabajo· Teletrabajo parcialRequisitos:Estudios mínimos: Grado universitario en informática o equivalente. Deseable Máster en Cloud Computing, Data Science, Big Data, o rama relacionadaExperiencia mínima: Al menos 4 años en desarrollo de softwareResidente en: Imprescindible en España preferiblemente en CanariasRequisitos mínimos:Conocimientos o desarrollo de Servicios web y/o algoritmos con PythonConocimientos avanzados en SQL (Oracle, PosgreSQL)Conocimientos de Front End (Javascript/Typescript)CI/CD (Gitlab, Jenkins)Conocimientos de Arquitecturas Cloud Computing (Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform)Requisitos deseados:Conocimientos de Machine Learning / IALenguajes de programación analíticos y de manejo de datos en entornos Big Data (spark, pyspark, rspark). Competencias:Proactividad, espíritu de equipo, disponibilidad para viajes eventualesOrientación al clienteCapacidades organizativas y de motivación del equipoTelespazio Iberica apuesta y fomenta la inclusión de personas con discapacidad valorando estas candidaturas en sus procesos de selección. La presente oferta de empleo está redactada teniendo en cuenta la imparcialidad y no discriminación por razón de género, raza, ideología o cualquier otro motivo.

herramientas: ['Ciencias de la computación', 'Delivery Of Projects', 'Desarrollo front end', 'Dirección técnica', 'Drupal', 'Next.js', 'Requisitos del usuario', 'Resolución de problemas', 'Sitecore', 'Software de gestión de proyectos']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoROI UP Group is looking for Frontend Tech LeadAs the Tech Lead Frontend, you will be instrumental in guiding our frontend development initiatives, steering a dynamic team towards the creation of innovative and user-centric solutions. Your role encompasses technical leadership, hands-on development, and collaboration with cross-functional teams. Proficiency in Next.js is highly desirable, along with experience in Sitecore XM Cloud, Drupal/Acquia, GraphQL, web vitals optimization, component-driven design, Storybook, onboarding, mentoring, and proficiency in working with JIRA and Confluence.Qualifications:Minimum C1 English level for effective communication with an international team and clients.Bachelor's degree in computer science, Software Engineering, or a related field.Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in frontend development.At least 2 years of experience in a technical leadership role, leading and mentoring a frontend development team.Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive web design.Strong understanding of frontend architecture, design patterns, and best practices.Experience with Next.js, Sitecore XM Cloud headless services, Drupal/Acquia, GraphQL, and web vitals optimization.Familiarity with component-driven design principles and tools like Storybook.Experience in onboarding and mentoring new developers.Proficiency in project management tools (JIRA) and documentation tools (Confluence).Soft Skills:Collaboration: Ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams and communicate ideas clearly.Adaptability: Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and development methodologies.Problem-Solving: A creative thinker who can find innovative solutions to complex problems.Attention to Detail: A keen eye for detail to ensure the delivery of high-quality code and user experiences.Time Management: Ability to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines.Process: Please send us candidates' resumes, a portfolio of relevant work, and a cover letter highlighting their experience with Next.js, JIRA, Confluence, and any experience with Sitecore headless services (JSS).Please include details on their role in previous projects and how they overcame challenges.Note: A technical assessment may be part of the interview process to evaluate programming skills.Responsibilities:Provide strategic technical leadership, emphasizing best practices in frontend development.Mentor and develop team members, fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented culture.Collaborate with project managers and cross-functional teams to plan and execute frontend development tasks within project timelines.Ensure the successful delivery of projects, meeting quality standards and user requirements.Conduct thorough code reviews, emphasizing best practices and ensuring code quality and consistency.Implement and oversee quality assurance processes to identify and address potential issues proactively.Leverage expertise in Next.js, Sitecore XM Cloud, Drupal/Acquia, GraphQL, and web vitals optimization to architect and develop robust frontend solutions.Implement and promote component-driven design principles, utilizing tools like Storybook for efficient component development and documentation.Facilitate the onboarding process for new developers, providing mentorship and guidance to ensure a smooth integration into the team.Collaborate effectively with UX/UI designers, backend developers, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless integration of frontend components.Why ROI UP?We are more than 180 people of 18 different nationalities who are passionate about our work.Every day will be a challengeThanks to our partner Cobee we are able to offer all our employees a flexible remuneration (restaurants/transportation/daycare...).You will benefit from our flexible health insurance through our partner Alan, who will take care of you in a 360º way (doctors, psychologists, nutrition...).You will have continuous training from the whole team and different external trainings.You will be able to enjoy your hobbies and social life thanks to our flexible working hours.Fridays are from 9:00 am to 3:00 pm!If it's your birthday, you can have the whole afternoon free to celebrate with your loved ones!Dress code? no, you can dress as you feel comfortable!You will have the benefits of working from home as well as from the office.In summer you can enjoy the long afternoons from 15:00 onwards.We have a great atmosphere!Who is ROI UP?ROI UP Group is a 360 Digital Marketing Agency with offices in Madrid, Barcelona, Alicante, Valencia, Galicia, Lisbon, Mexico City and Bogota, formed by a team of 180 people.Starting with the naming of our Agency, and following with our work strategies and international team, we get involved in the achievement of the client's results to maximize the ROI of our actions with the different tools available in marketing and technology, providing services in 14 languages for projects in Europe and/or Latin America.You can also send us your CV directly to: people@roi-up.esWe are waiting for you!We inform that the personal data provided with the CV or sent to our company in any other way, will be processed by ROI UP Agency, S.L. (hereinafter ROI UP), with NIF B86101995 and address at Calle Orense 70, 4ºD, 28020, Madrid.The purpose of this data processing is the management of ROI UP's personnel selection processes, and is based on your prior consent. Your data will be kept for one year, after which they will be deleted.At any time you may revoke your consent or exercise your rights of access, rectification, deletion, portability, limitation or opposition by writing to ROI UP, at the above address or email dpo@roi-up.es.

descripcion: Acerca del empleoYour next opportunity is on its way!VILT is an IT company, where we value our people, promote teamwork and, of course, good humor.Take a look at this job opportunity and see if you are the next VILTian! (if you know someone, don't forget to recommend them)We are looking for a person to work as Senior AEM DeveloperWhat we want from you:A degree in Information Technology.Knowledge of Java.Knowledge of Maven, Sling, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.Experience working as a technical lead.4 years or more experience using AEM (Adobe Experience Manager).Fluency in English and Spanish is mandatory, knowledge of French is highly desirable.We are waiting your application! :)

descripcion: Acerca del empleoAbout Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 3.6 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND (RELOCATION PROVIDED)Location of this job: Bangkok, Thailand (*Not open for remote working.)About Agoda Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.Get to Know our Team:The role sits within the Analytics team under Supply department, where new business ideas, and partnership types are incubated and scaled. This is a broad scoped role, suited to those with a track record of leading small analytics function and/or creating new and high impact business verticals from scratch, from a consulting, sales or business development background with a strong entrepreneurial mindset. You will be expected to perform opportunity sizing on new business opportunities, build high level business cases to justify your proposals and work closely with Product teams to build out new features and functionalities prior to dealing directly with external partners to negotiate and close deals.We are seeking a Manager/Senior Manager, Analytics & Insights, to lead strategic and operational initiatives that create both growth and efficiency for the Supply department. In this role, you will work directly with multiple stakeholders, including executive leadership and various cross-functional departments to successfully implement key initiatives. You will impact Agoda’s business through exploring new business opportunities, analyzing complex scaling challenges, and improve existing operations.The Opportunity:In this Role, you’ll get to: General: This role is a blend of hands on ‘in the business’ and executive level ‘on the business’ work. To succeed you will enjoy rolling up your sleeves, leading a team and contributing to strategyProject Delivery: Manage, standardize & validate the structure of business cases for product development, headcount, engineering resources, budgets, general strategic & roadmap prioritizationExperimentation: Define success, measure / validate experiments and help ingrain an experimental mindset within the teamsForecasting and Insights: Provide a macro-led business intelligence view to the organization to prevent missed opportunities, surmount obstacles at all organizational levels and drive commercial descripcion: Acerca del empleoThe Information Technology department is looking for an IT Analyst. He/She will be responsible for supporting IT Services and Project Management.The candidate will provide the best IT solutions and related IT projects support. In addition, the IT Analyst will be the liaison between company departments, IT partners, and the main internal contact for the projects.Key Action Areas:Understanding the needs of Business Areas in order to identify and specify technical solutions to support.Analyzes and performs problem solving and resolution on simple issues. Escalates problems (when required) to the appropriately experienced technician.Coordinate testing cycles and support of incidents of Business Areas.Gathering feedback from end users to continue improving systems.Coordinate developers to build and implement technology solutions.Qualifications:Undergraduate degree, preferably in engineering or IT.High level of written and spoken English and Spanish-+3 years of experience in IT projects related to software development in Technology or Consulting companies, or IT departments.Strong technical background: Microsoft technologies (.net, SQL Server, Azure Devops…), web development (Java, API rest) and cloud computing.Experience in agile software development life-cycles.What do we offer?Learn through the quality of the projects you will be working on. You will also have the possibility to evolve through the wide range of courses and masters delivered by our institution.Be part of an International Education Institution that has Innovation and Technology as part of its mindset.Flexible hours and teleworking.Flexible remuneration plan including social benefits (health insurance, restaurant Tickets…).Join Our Talent Community!Looking for an amazing career opportunity, but just not seeing exactly what you want? We are always looking for top talent and we are interested in connecting with you in the future!

titulo: Research Engineer - Energy optimization for 6G networks
herramientas: ['5G', 'Amazon Simple Notification Service (SNS)', 'Análisis de circuitos', 'Análisis de datos', 'Ciencias de la computación', 'Iperf', 'Red central', 'Tcpdump', 'Wi-Fi', 'Wireshark']
descripcion: Acerca del empleoThe i2cat Foundation is looking for an Engineer/Researcher to work on energy optimization topics within the framework of the SNS BeGREEN project https://www.sns-begreen.com/. to join the Mobile and Wireless Internet (MWI) group.The Engineer/Researcher will carry out experimental research evaluating the power saving mechanisms available in compute platforms used to instantiate 5G network functions (e.g. management of CPU states). The successful candidate will also work on the development of algorithms that can best exploit the available power saving mechanisms to minimize power consumption without affecting traffic performance.The candidates responsabilities include:Develop a testbed for evaluating energy consumption of 5G network functions on existent compute platformCarry out performance evaluation to understand impact of compute power saving mechanisms on energy consumption and traffic performancePropose and evaluate algorithms that exploit platform power saving mechanisms to reduce energy consumptionContribute to deliverables and publicationsThe Engineer/Researcher will directly contribute to BeGreen WP4, attending meetings and contributing to the project deliverables and publications. The successful candidate will collaborate with other junior and senior researchers at MWI that focus on 5G and Open RAN topics and are also contributing to the BeGreen project.BeGREEN project will take a holistic view to propose evolving radio networks that not only accommodate increasing traffic and services but also consider power consumption as a factor. We expected to obtain a mechanism that adjusts CPU power states to reduce energy consumption in virtualized UPF systems. The designed system should be portable to any x86 or ARM compute platforms.Minimum requirements:Bachelor's degree in telecommunications or computer scienceExperience with Linux systems and networkingExperience coding in PythonBasic knowledge on 5G, specially on the 5G Core NetworkBasic knowledge of network analysis tools (wireshark, tcpdump, iperf).Basict knowledge of python for data analysisGood level of EnglishDesired requirements:Experience coding in C/C++Knowledge on CPU management in Linux (c-states, p-states, power control...)Knowledge on monitoring and log tools (e.g. Prometheus, ELK)Knowledge on radio accesss networks (5G, Wi-Fi)Knowledge on the O-RAN architectureMaster or PhD in related topics will be valuedShe/he will be part of the O-RAN team within MWI-SDWN and will report to a senior researcher within the MWI team. More info about Mobile Wireless Internet group here: https://i2cat.net/research-topics/mobile-wireless-internetWho we are:The i2CAT Foundation is a non-profit research and innovation center that promotes mission-driven R&D activities on advanced Internet architectures, applications, and services. More than 15 years of international research define our expertise in the fields of 5G, IoT, VR, and Immersive Technologies, Cybersecurity, Blockchain, AI, and Digital Social Innovation. The center partners with companies, public administration, academia, and end-users to leverage this knowledge in order to meet real social and business challenges.The greatest value of i2CAT is the talent of the people who make up our human team. We enjoy a team of people from more than 13 different nationalities and work every day to create and foster a work environment where we all feel comfortable creating, innovating and growing.Want to know more? Visit our webpage! www.i2cat.netWhat will you enjoy?Work from our offices or from home, whichever works best for you. We ask for two days in person at the office to coordinate with the rest of the team.This is a full-time vacancyWe have a flexible work schedule respecting your work-life balanceReduced working hours on Fridays and in July and AugustFix + variable salaryOptional benefits: Travel pass, restaurant vouchers, nursery services support, medical insuranceAnnual leave of 27 working daysWe have fruit in the office to promote a healthy lifestyleIf you are interested, you can participate in events of your sector.You will work with a laptop. You can choose your operative system, Mac, Linux or Windows.Company social and team-building events (virtual & in-person)You can develop your own and personal training programme with our supportWe will work so that you have a career plan to promote your growth and developmentWhere will you do it?At i2CAT we already have an established ‘work-from-home’ policy for some time. You can work from home or from the office, whichever suits you best. We expect that you attend the office two days per week: one to stay connected with your team and another one to engage with other colleaguesIf you decide to come to the office, we are located in Zona Universitària, next to the Campus Nord of the UPC, within a multidisciplinary and multicultural environment. It is a very well-connected area (metro, tram, bus) with bars and restaurants around.Our offices are designed with an open-office concept where everything is light and transparency. We have a variety of workspaces so that you don't have to be at the same table all day.i2CAT is an organization committed to equal opportunities. That is why we seek to increase the number of women in those areas where they are underrepresented, and therefore explicitly encourage female candidates to apply.I2CAT is an organization committed to creating an environment where we celebrate diversity, and where we provide the dedicated support that our employees need, regardless of their disability.If what you have read sounds good to you... let’s have a coffee and we will tell you more!In case you liked it, but it is not your job offer, you may know someone else who fits perfectly and whom you would like to recommend!
